description: It must have been fate that drew Vinnie, the smoldering ex-soldier with the chiseled face, thick legs and one of the most desired asses, to the set one day a couple of years ago, along with Mauricio, the freshly graduated, teen idol-faced hottie with 8' of uncut meat and a powerfully electrifying sexuality. We cannot think of a more memorable way to wish you all a Happy Memorial Day.
title: Happy Memorial Daze
